font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 自满，无忧患意识：a feeling of self-satisfaction, coupled with an unawareness of trouble
【例】Complacency is the enemy of study.
【例】A momentary complacency that was quickly dispelled by the shock of cold reality.
【近】conceit, pomposity, pompousness, pride, self-admiration, self-assumption, smugness, vanity
【反】anxiety 忧虑；humbleness, humility, modesty 谦虚
